arts.ttl: On-loan Manchester United ace Joe Hugill gives verdict after Wigan Athletic hammer Bristol Rovers
arts.sum: Joe Hugill hailed Shaun Maloney's hard work on the training ground for his brilliant brace as Wigan Athletic recorded their second victory of the season at Bristol Rovers.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic boss reflects on Bristol Rovers romp - and makes surprising performance revelation
arts.sum: Shaun Maloney insisted Wigan Athletic's 4-0 victory at Bristol Rovers had been coming - and that the performance had been no better than in the last league game at Birmingham.

arts.ttl: Joe Hugill at the double as Wigan crush Bristol Rovers
arts.sum: Thelo Aasgaard and Luke Chambers were also on target.

arts.ttl: REPORT: Bristol Rovers 0 Wigan Athletic 4: Four-midable Tics make amends for last season with Bristol bashing
arts.sum: Wonderful Wigan Athletic made amends for last season’s 4-1 drubbing at Bristol Rovers by inflicting a 4-0 demolition on their hosts, who were booed off at half-time and full-time.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic transfer chief gives huge hint about incomings
arts.sum: Sporting director Gregor Rioch has revealed Wigan Athletic have the funds and scope to bring in a free agent outside the transfer window - if manager Shaun Maloney feels it necessary.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic are still a 'monster' at League One level, insists rival chief
arts.sum: Wigan Athletic have been described as a 'monster at this level' - by Bristol Rovers boss Matt Taylor ahead of this weekend's meeting at the Memorial Stadium.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic: Seven changes in our expected team v Bristol Rovers
arts.sum: Paul Kendrick runs the rule over the Wigan Athletic squad and predicts the 11 men who Shaun Maloney will select to start at Bristol Rovers

arts.ttl: Former Wigan Athletic man joins Wayne Rooney at Plymouth Argyle
arts.sum: Championship outfit Plymouth Argyle have snapped up former Wigan Athletic goalkeeper Marko Marosi.

arts.ttl: Wigan Warriors and Wigan Athletic pay tribute to ‘unsung hero’ following sad passing
arts.sum: Wigan Warriors and Wigan Athletic have paid tribute to ‘unsung hero’ Carol Madden, who passed away peacefully in her sleep on Friday surrounded by her family following a short illness.

arts.ttl: Weir to start: Wigan Athletic team news and predicted XI to face Bristol Rovers
arts.sum: Wigan Athletic are back in League One action this weekend with an away trip to the Memorial Ground… The post Weir to start: Wigan Athletic team news and predicted XI to face Bristol Rovers appeared first on The72 - Football League News.
